entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0041.73] The dimension default defined for the axis in the US GAAP Taxonomy should not be changed in a company extension taxonomy. The default for the us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesByIndustryAxis in the base taxonomy is us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesIndustryMember, but the default has been replaced with srt:ConsolidationItemsDomain in the extension taxonomy role 000034 - Disclosure - Loans (Details 1). This issue is addressed in Question E.16 (Updated 02/05/2013) (formerly Question 38) of the SEC Staff Interpretations and FAQs Related to Interactive Data Disclosure. Rule version: 26.0.9 -
